title: For over 3 patches now DJ Sona has been completely MUTE
body:
Her red form has no quotes at all, they just won't play.
Her other two forms have issues too, but it's definitely bugged for a while now


Please look into it it's been a while and it's a 3250 RP Skin it shouldn't be bugged for so long...

replies.body:
Is this a recent bug? Maybe affecting mostly legendary and ultimate skins?

Because I've noticed PROJECT: Vayne not saying anything one she hits level 6. It's only until level 11 or 16 she starts saying quotes for reaching those levels.

That was a bug? lol =/ Couldn't notice over the music. Guess I'll need to turn off voices when I play Sona now. But I love it as is, plz don't fix.

If we had an option to mute the voice of the champion we are playing, that would be neat. That way I won't miss out on audio queues if I turn off all voices.

Plz don't fix. Whatever is wrong, it's it's actually right. Plz no fixing.

Hey! 
Sorry for the delay on a fix here. ;-; We've touched up several DJ Sona issues, all of which should be in 8.7. If you're still experiencing issues once 8.7 goes live, please let me know!

Hi, sorry to highjack this comment but, since it's about long lasting bug, I was wondering if there is any new about a fix for spectator weird walk animation?

Dunno if this is in the skin team field or not but, as you maybe know, some champ, like garen/xin/sivir to name a few, have really weird walking animation when you spectate a game.
It wouldn't be that big of a problem if it was spectate only but, recently, I saw the same bug during multiple LCS game (cast use spectator mode?) so maybe those live experience of the bug would help you fix it

Spirit Guard Udyr was glitched for literal years before they fixed it (only playing bear stance lines in every stance if I remember correctly) and even when they fixed the voice lines his kill effects were still the wrong color most of the time. Hell, it might even still be glitched to this day. Pretty annoying.

I fell for it the first time I read this.

On another note, she could just move to piltover...
They said they were aware of it and bringing a fix out. Then again they said they fixed the Jax bug, yet I've seen clips on Synapse of it still being in game.
Yes.  This needs to be fixed.
